attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due the our miserable climate we believe the UK government should order the Royal Navy to tow the UK to a postion just off the Azores. They should also extend the offer to Ireland who will no doubt be quite keen on this too and thus save a tricky polictical scenario of having to saw Northern Ireland off the Island.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
